example.eg: My favorite feature of this leather is its smooth texture.
example.egtrans: 我最中意这种皮革特有的光滑质地。

example.eg: She has perfect features.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相貌, 面貌, 容貌特征

example.eg: A huge movie theater is the main feature of the new mall.
example.egtrans: 新开的百货商场的主要特色就是内设一家超大的影院。

example.eg: I find my smartphone's autocorrect a really annoying feature.
example.egtrans: 我觉得智能手机自动修正功能特别讨厌。

example.eg: The newspaper featured her on the front page.
example.egtrans: 这本杂志在首页登载了她的特写。

example.eg: The magazine is featuring Britain's top 10 restaurants in its July issue.
example.egtrans: 这本杂志将在7月刊内突出介绍英国十大餐厅。

example.eg: The movie features Johnny Depp as a vampire.
example.egtrans: 这部电影由强尼·德普主演，角色是一名吸血鬼。

example.eg: The new model of this computer features more memory and a faster processor.
example.egtrans: 这种电脑的新型号突出展现自身更多的内存以及更快的处理速度。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以…为特色而大做广告, 突出介绍, 突出展现

example.eg: He is a feature of the local Jazz scene.
example.egtrans: 他是当地爵士 乐坛的知名人物。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 知名人物, 著名人物

example.eg: The main feature starts at eight o'clock.
We're publishing a feature on the homeless.
example.egtrans: 我们将刊载一篇关于无家可归者的特别报道。

example.eg: Just feature yourself on a beautiful, sandy beach!
This theme features prominently in Mr. Gold's newest book.
example.egtrans: 该主题在高尔德先生的最新著作中占据着非常重要的地位。

example.eg: Most Norman churches feature a tall steeple.
example.egtrans: 高高的尖塔是多数诺曼教堂的特色所在。

example.eg: Jimmy's most distinctive feature is his enormous nose.
I can't remember the last time I saw a double bill at a cinema.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 连场电影, 双场电影

example.eg: At the movie theater there are usually commercials and previews before the feature film.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 故事片, 剧情片, 剧情片

example.eg: Her debut as a director was a feature-length comedy about life in the city.
A key feature of the new system will be an entirely comprehensive database, accessible to all.
The main feature in today's Times is an article on rising crime.
When I was young, cinemas used to play short films before the main feature.
The main feature of this website is to provide knowledge about words.
A permanent feature of our new building will be the "statue garden" adjoining the main entrance.
She's a thoroughly unpleasant person, with no redeeming features.
